FuncDef:
The dhcp discover-speed-threshold command configures the speed threshold at which discover packets are received.
The undo dhcp discover-speed-threshold command deletes the speed threshold at which discover packets are received.
By default, the speed at which discover packets are received is not specified.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of discover packets that are received within a specified time period.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 3000.

Specifies the maximum number of discover packets that are received within a specified time period.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 10.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The dhcp discover-speed-threshold command is used when the speed at which users go online needs to be limited.
Configuration Impact
The more discover packets are received within a specified time period, the faster users go online.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
